column4: E == enlightenment windowmanager, a once-interesting windowmanager that's slowly becoming something awesome...though by the time it does, I fear something else will be better than E
I thought it was annoying. like trying to be all 1984ish
I agree.  a lot of emphasis on being pretty, not enough on being less user-hostile ;-)
Dude, its like watching a sick combination of 2001 and 1984. E scares me that much
